title: I Was a Shadow of the Royal Family, but Now That I’ve Been Reborn, I’m Devoted to You in This Life As Well! - Novel Updates
tags: Assassins   Broken Engagement   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Reincarnation   Royalty   Short Story   Villainess Noble Girls   Wars
author: Hitomaru   ひとまる
description:
Milan is a shadow of the royal family, serving the young first prince, Lorde, and spending time with him like family.

When the kingdom becomes embroiled in war, Milan is killed while protecting the first prince during the chaos of war.

In time, Milan is reborn as Duchess Lisel of Jeus. She lives in the shadow of the royal family and remembers Milan swearing allegiance to the royal family.

After inheriting Milan's will, Lisel trains in secret, honing her espionage and assassination skills to the same level as her former self.

She becomes engaged to Eduardo, the son of King Lorde, and vows to protect him and make him the future king, but her loyalties are too strong and she is shunned.

Eduardo is attracted to the baroness, and Lisel is forced to break the engagement!
>
